p: The fruit is the main part of the plants that are used as food in the region, since it was mentioned for 76.9% of the plants. The other plants have their leaves (15.4%) and tubers (7.7%) used for consumption. There was a strong specialization in consumption, in the sense that only one part of each plant was mentioned as consumed by more than one interviewee. In the case of taioba ( X. sagittifolium), in addition to the leaf, the corm was also mentioned as food. However, it was not included in the descriptive or inferential statistical analysis because it was mentioned by only one interviewee.
